content:
direct pdf download crochet curly whirly scarf
**nb the instructions for this scarf are written using english crochet terms but for us crocheters who might want to use the pattern english double_crochet double_crochet = us single_crochet single_crochet english treble_crochet treble = us double_crochet double_crochet chains chain and slip stitches slip_stitch are the same on both sides of the atlantic**
